text: Pfäfers is a municipality in Sarganserland in the canton of St. Gallen in Switzerland. == Villages == Pfäfers, St. Margrethenberg, Vadura, Valens, Vasön and Vättis. == References == == Other websites == * Website of the Fraction of Pfäfers * Website of the Fraction of Vättis Category:Municipalities in Sarganserland
title: Pfäfers
